name: WriteOnline WordBar File
summary: Learn about .AWBR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: WordBar is a talking word bank tool offered by WriteOnline and designed to improve students' vocabulary and develop their writing structure. WriteOnline is available for Windows and OS X but has been discontinued for iOS.

description: An AWBR file is a WordBar file used by WriteOnline, a literacy tool used to help struggling writers in middle school through college. The file contains one or more word banks about subjects such as clothing, countries, and food.
